data.message: How disappointing - I've been trying since Wednesday; you either cannot get into the website to enter a code or if by chance the website is working the codes are just not recognised - what a swizz.  Even if my chances of winning are next to 0 it would still be nice to enter!!

replies.message: Hi Tracey, we're sorry to hear you've been having such trouble entering the promotion. We'd like to help you troubleshoot, please could you call us on 0800 22 77 11 (option 1). Thanks
